amendment.description: An amendment numbered 107 printed in Part A of House Report 115-650 to provide for reimbursement to state and local units of government for housing that produces cost-savings to comparable FEMA solutions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Graves (LA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (LA) amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
